TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE( TRUE, ISNULL(lkp_Borrower_ID), 'New', lkp_Name != Name OR lkp_NoEmp != NoEmp OR lkp_NewExist != NewExist OR lkp_CreateJob != CreateJob OR lkp_RetainedJob != RetainedJob OR lkp_FranchiseCode != FranchiseCode OR lkp_UrbanRural != UrbanRural OR lkp_NAICS != NAICS OR lkp_RevLineCr != RevLineCr, 'Changed', 'No Change' )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: op_flag

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1
